subject: Thanks, we accepted your loan request
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
 
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire NOW):
 
$332,000+ debt
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
 
Hurry, when our best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this user-friendly form... 
 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
 
http://stelziuxister.com/
